story-context.story-summary: Story 7-3 delivers a Python SDK that wraps MCP and A2A endpoints using httpx. The SDK provides typed response models and async client helpers for external integrations.
story-context.relevant-files: - backend/src/agentic_rag_backend/api/routes/mcp.py (MCP response shapes) - backend/src/agentic_rag_backend/api/routes/a2a.py (A2A response shapes) - backend/pyproject.toml (httpx dependency)
